translations: n．戒酒者，禁欲主义者：避免饮酒或其他某种享乐活动的人。
· Some abstainers choose not to drink alcohol for health reasons.
一些戒酒者出于健康原因选择不喝酒。

sentences.sentence: The most shocking part? Abstainers' mortality rates are higher than those of heavy drinkers.
sentences.translation: 而最让人震惊的问题是，戒酒者的死亡率要远远高于酗酒者。

sentences.sentence: The number of incoming abstainers has been going up at Roger Williams University in Bristol, R.I.
sentences.translation: 在位于美国罗德岛州布里斯托尔的罗杰·威廉姆斯大学，不饮酒的新生人数已经开始持续上升。

sentences.sentence: The number of incoming abstainers has been going up at Roger Williams University in Bristol, R. I.
sentences.translation: 在位于美国罗德岛州布里斯托尔的罗杰·威廉姆斯大学，不饮酒的新生人数已经开始持续上升。
